titleStmt.title: Sack for my money: or, A description of the operation of sack that is still'd in the Spanish nation: then buy it, deny it, like it or leave it, not one amongst ten but is willing to have it. The tune is, Wet and weary.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Gilbertson in Giltspur-street.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Good fellows a[l]l both great and small ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
